ticket.title: activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb does not declare dependencies for at_beginning_of_week
ticket.original-body:
Testing against master
@@@ $ bundle console ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > require 'active_support/core_ext/time/calculations' => true ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Time.now.at_beginning_of_week NoMethodError: undefined method `days' for 4:Fixnum from /Users/betelgeuse/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02/bundler/gems/rails-8491f16e128d/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb:168:in `at_beginning_of_week' from (irb):2 @@@
ticket.latest-body:
Testing against master
@@@ $ bundle console ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > require 'active_support/core_ext/time/calculations' => true ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Time.now.at_beginning_of_week NoMethodError: undefined method `days' for 4:Fixnum from /Users/betelgeuse/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02/bundler/gems/rails-8491f16e128d/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb:168:in `at_beginning_of_week' from (irb):2 @@@
ticket.original-body-html:
Testing against master

$ bundle console
ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > require 'active_support/core_ext/time/calculations'
 => true 
ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Time.now.at_beginning_of_week
NoMethodError: undefined method `days' for 4:Fixnum
    from /Users/betelgeuse/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02/bundler/gems/rails-8491f16e128d/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb:168:in `at_beginning_of_week'
    from (irb):2

version.body:
Testing against master
@@@ $ bundle console ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > require 'active_support/core_ext/time/calculations' => true ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Time.now.at_beginning_of_week NoMethodError: undefined method `days' for 4:Fixnum from /Users/betelgeuse/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02/bundler/gems/rails-8491f16e128d/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb:168:in `at_beginning_of_week' from (irb):2 @@@
version.body-html:
Testing against master

$ bundle console
ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > require 'active_support/core_ext/time/calculations'
 => true 
ree-1.8.7-2010.02 > Time.now.at_beginning_of_week
NoMethodError: undefined method `days' for 4:Fixnum
    from /Users/betelgeuse/.rvm/gems/ree-1.8.7-2010.02/bundler/gems/rails-8491f16e128d/activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb:168:in `at_beginning_of_week'
    from (irb):2
version.title: activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb does not declare dependencies for at_beginning_of_week

version.body:
at_beginning_of_week also needs: 'active_support/core_ext/object/conversions'
Not sure if it is assumed that, as a component of core_ext, it should be assumed that at_beginning_of_week would require all of active_support/core_ext.
I attached a trivial patch
version.body-html:
at_beginning_of_week also needs: 'active_support/core_ext/object/conversions'

Not sure if it is assumed that, as a component of core_ext, it should be assumed that at_beginning_of_week would require all of active_support/core_ext.

I attached a trivial patch
version.title: activesupport/lib/active_support/core_ext/time/calculations.rb does not declare dependencies for at_beginning_of_week

version.body:
Similarly, on ruby-1.9.2-p136
@@@ ruby require 'active_support/json' puts({ :hi => 'there' }.to_json) @@@
will give
@@@ uninitialized constant ActiveSupport::OrderedHash (NameError) @@@
version.body-html:
Similarly, on ruby-1.9.2-p136

require 'active_support/json'
puts({ :hi => 'there' }.to_json)

will give

uninitialized constant ActiveSupport::OrderedHash (NameError)
